ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Delay/Expedite Request Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND((ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Delays')|| ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Expedite Request')), ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed'), RecordType.Name!='NS Internal', NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, OR( ISBLANK(NS_CustomerContactNotifiedOfResolution__c) , ISBLANK(NS_CustomerNotifiedDateTime__c), ISBLANK(NS_OperationsManagementContact__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Customer Contact Notified, Date Customer Notified, and Operations Management Contact prior to closing the Case.
